growth.title: Crop Growth Planner
growth.subtitle: Real GDD accumulation · Live soil data · 16-day forecast

hints.no_location: Visit the Weather tab and search your city or use Locate Me — location is required to fetch soil & GDD data automatically.
hints.set_location: Set location in Weather tab first
hints.gdd_source: GDD computed from {{days}} days of actual historical temperatures via Open-Meteo
hints.soil_explain: Soil moisture levels help determine when to irrigate. Values below 20% indicate dry soil needing water.
hints.irrigation_explain: Based on soil moisture, forecast rainfall, and current crop stage requirements.
hints.gdd_early: Early growth phase — crop is still establishing roots.
hints.gdd_active: Active vegetative growth — nutrient uptake is increasing.
hints.gdd_mid: Mid-season — critical period for water and fertilizer.
hints.gdd_late: Late season — approaching maturity, reduce inputs.

hints.no_weather: Visit the Weather tab to auto-fill weather conditions from live data.
hints.conf_low: Low confidence — use your best judgment.

disease.title: Disease Detection
disease.subtitle: Upload a crop image for AI diagnosis

upload.placeholder: Click or drag to upload crop image

hints.severity_none: No disease detected — your crop appears healthy.
hints.severity_low: Early signs of infection. Treat now to prevent spread.
hints.severity_moderate: Visible infection that needs prompt treatment to protect yield.
hints.severity_high: Severe infection. Urgent treatment required to save the crop.
hints.severity_fallback: Review the diagnosis and consult an expert if needed.

weather.title: Local Weather & Farming Advisory
weather.subtitle: Real-time forecast & agricultural insights
weather.empty_state: Enter location or enable GPS to see weather.

advisories.rain_soon: Rain expected in next 48 hours. Delay spraying pesticides/fertilizers.
advisories.no_rain: No rain forecast. Suitable for irrigation and spraying.
advisories.high_wind: High wind speed ({{speed}} m/s). Avoid spraying to prevent drift.
advisories.high_humidity: High humidity (>80%). Increased risk of fungal diseases. Monitor crops closely.
advisories.heat_stress: Heat stress likelihood. Ensure adequate irrigation.
advisories.stable: Conditions are stable. Proceed with standard farming activities.

errors.geo_unsupported: Geolocation not supported by this browser.
